texts.ru: Садокат добросовестная и целеустремленная женщина. Она вместе со своей семьей живет счастливо в сельской местности. Садокат замужем и имеет 4 детей. Ее муж Хайрулло занимается строительными работами. Ее сын подрабатывает в Российской Федерации, так как он не имеет постоянное место работы. Садокат хочет сыграть свадьбу сына, так как она нашла подходящею невесту для своего сына. Она не имеет денег для того, чтобы сыграть свадьбу сына. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможет ей сделать счастливой ее сына.
texts.en: Sadokat is a conscientious and ambitious woman.  She lives happily with her family in a rural area of Tajikistan.  Sadokat is married and has four children.  Her husband, Khairullo works in construction.  Her son works as a migrant worker in Russia since he does not have reliable, full-time employment locally.  Sadokat wants to have a wedding for her son since she found him a worthy bride.  She currently can't afford to pay for the wedding herself.  She's asking for a loan of 5,000 KGS.  She awaits your kindness.  This loan will help her make her son happy.

loans.use: to fund a wedding party for her son

loans.name: Gairat

texts.ru: Гайрат трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 37 лет. Он женат и живет с женой и тремя детьми в районе Дж.Руми. Его жена швея, сам Гайрат занимается  земледелием. Гайрат всегда думает о будущем своих детей. Он хочет обеспечить им достойную жизнь и дать им образование. Поэтому он намерен начать новый бизнес в сфере овцеводства. Овцеводство как бизнес считается прибыльным, так как овцы дают ценные продукты - шерсть, мясо, кожи и мех, молоко, спрос на которых всегда высокий. Гайрат сначала собирается начать с малого количества овец и потом постепенно увеличивать его стадо. Он имеет все условия для содержания овец. Гайрат просит кредит для закупа двух голов овец и их корма. С полученной прибыли он хочет провести торжество по случаю обрезания своего младшего сына.
texts.en: Gairat is a hardworking man, age 37.  He is married and lives with his wife and three children in J.Rumy, Tajikistan.  His wife is a seamstress while Gairat himself works in agriculture.  He always things about the future of his children.  He wants to provide them with a worthy life and give them an education.  For this reason, he's intent on starting a new business with sheep.  Working with sheep is considered profitable since the sheep produces much of value like wool, meat, leather and fur which is always in demand.  Gairat plans to begin with a small number of sheep and then gradually increase his herd.  He has all the necessities to own sheep.  Gairat is asking for a loan to buy two head of cattle and their feed.  With his profits, he wants to hold a celebration  in honor of his youngest son's circumcision.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle and feed

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: Умедчон инженер и фермер, проживающий в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 37 лет. Он женат и является отцом троих детей. Умедчон имеет высшее инженерное образование. Он в течение трех лет работал инженером. А в последние годы он вместе с женой занимается растениеводством. Умедчон имеет 5 га земельного участка, где выращивает пшеницы и овощи. Он хорошо знает эту сферу деятельность и всегда работает усердно, чтобы собрать качественный и богатый урожай. Умедчон сейчас обратился за кредитом. Он хочет заказать услугу комбайна для сбора урожая пшеницы и закупить семена овощей, в частности лука, огурцов и т.д. для посева. Данный кредит позволит ему продолжить его земледельческую деятельность. Умедчон в будущем планирует заняться еще и садоводством.
texts.en:
Umedjon is an engineer and farmer, residing in the town of Tursun-zoda. He is 37 years old. He is married and is the father of three children. Umedjon has completed higher education in engineering. He has worked as an engineer for three years. In recent years, he and his wife have been involved in growing crops. Umedjon имеет 5 hectares of land, where he grows wheat and vegetables. He knows this sphere well and always works hard to raise a high-quality and rich harvest. 

Umedjon is now applying for a loan. He wants to engage combine services for harvesting wheat and to buy vegetable seeds, particularly onions, cucumbers, etc. for sowing. This loan will allow him to continue his agricultural activities. 

Umedjon in the future plans to engage in more agriculture.

loans.use: to pay for combine services for the wheat harvest and to purchase seeds for planting vegetables

loans.name: Waad

texts.en: Waad, who was born in 1990, lives in Mafraq, Jordan with nine siblings, two of whom have joined the military. Waad is planning to continue her studies and work after graduation to earn enough money to help her family in covering their needs. Now she is requesting a loan to be able to pay for her semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees.

loans.name: Binta's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 22 femmes du banc villageois de « Diambars de Doumassou » expression qui signifie vaillant. Femmes qui partagent des liens forts de solidarité et d’entre aide.  Elles vivent dans le même quartier  Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Binta, (assise à l’extrême droite), est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée et prend en charge 04 de ses enfants dont 02 filles et 02 garçons. Elle tient une table au marché central où elle vend des légumes frais qu’elle achète auprès de femmes détentrices de jardins de maraîchage en périphérie de la ville pour la revente au détail. Elle jouit d’une expérience dans cette activité.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter des légumes frais et avancé une partie aux fournisseurs pour assurer et maintenir sa clientèle durant l’hivernage.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’apporter son soutien à son mari dans la gestion quotidienne des dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
This group comprises 22 women from the banc villageois "Diambars de Doumassou", an expression which means "to show courage and determination".  These women share strong ties of solidarity and mutual assistance.  They all live in the same neighborhood and their main activity is small retail business.

Binta (seated at the far right in the photo), is the group's representative.  She is married and supports four of her children (two girls and two boys).  She has a table at the central market, where she sells fresh vegetables.  She buys her produce from women who have their own gardens on the outskirts of town, and she resells her merchandise on a retail basis.  She is very experienced in this activity.

She plans to use this loan to buy fresh vegetables, and also to pay an advance to her wholesalers, in order to maintain her customer base during the rainy season.

The profits from her business will allow her to help her husband with the daily management of the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables and to pay an advance to her wholesalers in order to maintain her customer base during the rainy season.

loans.name: Rudy Alexis

texts.es:
Rudy tiene 31 años de edad, es acompañado y tiene dos hijos. Él posee 10 años de experiencia en el cuido y manejo de ganado de engorde en repasto, esto lo aprendió con su papá; ya que desde que era muy pequeño lo mandaban a cuidar los animales y a trabajar en las labores agrícolas en sus cultivos, también aprendió el oficio de estructuras metálicas; pero no hay mucho trabajo en eso,  ya que la situación de pobreza en la que vivían no les permitía tener un empleo digno, encontraron en el campo su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos para poder subsistir con su familia. A Rudy no lo mandaron a la escuela por lo que sus posibilidades de encontrar un buen empleo son muy remotas, es por eso que se dedica a tiempo completo a cuidar sus novillos y sus cultivos, para asegurarse que a su familia no le falte su comida aunque sea con arroz y frijoles. 

 para comprar sus novillos, tiene que abordar un camión en su comunidad, en donde van varias personas a comprar, ahí viaja durante 45 minutos, al llegar al tiangue tiene que escoger los animales que le gustan, esto a veces pude demorarse casi todo el día; pero al comprar sus novillos busca un camión de los que lleva viaje hasta su comunidad, sube sus animales y regresa a casa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para  comprar  4 novillos de engorde en repasto.
 incrementar su hato, y así la venta de animales ya gordos seria mas continua, por lo que también sus ingresos serán mayores. si la venta de novillos es mas continua, por lógica también los ingresos lo serán, y esto ayudara a que su familia puedan por lo menos tener asegurada su comida y el pago de su préstamo.

Don Rudy planea ahorrar, para que sus hijos estudien mucho y también hacer mas grande su casa, ya que es muy pequeña.
texts.en:
Rudy, 31, has a spouse and two children.  He has ten years’ experience caring for and managing grazing cattle.  He learned this from his father since he used to send him to care for the animals and do farm chores when he was a little boy; he also learned how to build metal structures but there isn’t much work in that.  Because of the poverty level they found themselves in they found in field work their only source of income to support the family.  Rudy was never sent to school so his probability of finding a good job is remote which is why he spends all his time caring for his calves and his crops to insure that his family does not lack food even if it’s only rice and beans.

In order to buy his calves he must take a bus in is community that several people use to go buy.  He travels for 45 minutes and when he gets to the market he has to choose the animals he likes which can sometimes take all day.  When he finds the calves he has to find a truck to take them to his community; he loads the animals and returns home.

The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy four grazing calves to fatten up, to increase his herd size so that he can continue selling animals once they have been fattened up.  In this way his income will increase because it’s logical that if the sale of calves is continuous so too will his income be greater and this will help so that his family will at least have their food assured as well as the repayment of the loan.  Rudy plans to save so that his children can study much and also to enlarge his house because it’s very small.

loans.use: to buy four calves to fatten up.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es: Dina, de 59 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, es viuda hace 23 años y vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos de 35 y 26 años de edad quienes la acompañan y apoyan, habitando su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Dina es la venta de periódicos. Diariamente se levanta muy temprano y se dirige a la imprenta donde compra sus periódicos. Todo lo que obtiene los lleva a su puesto de ventas ubicado en un mercado conocido de su localidad, en algunas ocasiones vende de manera ambulatoria caminando por las calles de la ciudad. Lleva realizando éste oficio un promedio de 22 años aunque ocasionalmente recibe el apoyo de su hijo por lo general trabaja sola. Espera seguir adelante y conseguir el dinero necesario para llevar una vejez tranquila. Este es su décimo préstamo con Kiva, por tanto agradece el apoyo que le brindan para acceder al crédito y continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará de periódicos de manera progresiva.
texts.en:
Dina, 59, is a hardworking, dedicated woman.  She’s been a widow for the last 23 years and lives with her two children who are 35 and 26 years of age; they keep her company and support her living in her own house.  The activity Dina carries out is selling newspapers.  

She rises very early every day and heads to the print shop where she buys her newspapers.  Everything she gets she takes to her stand located in a well-known local market.  Sometimes she sells from place to place along the streets in town.  She’s been in this occupation for about 22 years.  Although her son sometimes helps her for the most part she works alone.  

She hopes to continue forward and to get enough money to have a peaceful old age.  This is her 10th Kiva loan so she’s grateful for the support she gets to access the loan and continue towards her objectives.  She will use the requested 1,000 new soles to buy newspapers progressively.

loans.use: to buy newspapers.

loans.name: Oltin

texts.ru: Олтин женщина с доброй душой и яркой личностью. Она родилась в 1960 году в сельской местности. Она родилась и выросла в бедной семье. С детства она помогала родителям по земледелию. Поэтому она имеет большой опыт по земледелию, так как земледелие до сих пор является ее основным источником дохода. Она более 20 лет самостоятельно занимается этим бизнесом. Олтин выращивает в основном арбуз, рис и кукурузу. Она дополнительно занимается скотоводством, так как доход от земледелия не хватает для обеспечения семьи. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Олтин хочет развевать бизнес дальше и продавать свою продукцию местным жителям с высоким качеством. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки минерального удобрения и скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Oltin is a woman with a kind spirit and bright personality.  She was born in 1960 in a rural area.  She was born and grew up in a poor family.  since her childhood, she has helped her parents work in agriculture.  Therefore, she has much experience in the field since farming is still her main source of income.  For more than 20 years this has been her business alone.  Oltin mostly grows watermelon, rice and corn.  She also works with livestock since the income from farming isn't enough to provide for the family.  she is married and has three children.  Her husband helps her run the business.  Oltin wants to expand the business further and sell her products of high quality to locals.  She is asking for a loan of 6,000 KGS to buy mineral fertilizers and cattle.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase canned goods, spices, sugar, coffee creamer, coffee, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Dalia Marisol

texts.es:
Dalia, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo; este le permitirá comprar materia prima para la elaboración de pupusas y mesas junto con sillas para atender a los clientes.
El efecto del préstamo anterior fue favorable, ya que logro salir de la crisis  y pérdida de su esposo; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares mantiene igual.
texts.en:
Dalia needs to apply for a new loan because she needs more working capital.  It will make it possible for her to buy raw materials to make ‘pupusas’ [grilled, filled corn cakes] and to buy tables and chairs for customer service.  

Her previous loan had a favorable effect in that she managed to overcome the crisis and the loss of her husband; economic conditions and family circumstances remain the same.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Samart's Group

texts.en: A married mother of seven children, 53-year-old Samart lives in a rural village in the Sa Ang district, Cambodia. To support her large family, she and her husband have been growing corn for 28 years. They can earn about KHR20,000 per day to meet the family’s needs. Samart has been with VisionFund for four cycles. She has completely paid back her past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s burden. Now she is leading her group of two to apply for a loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for planting corn. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s income to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for planting corn.

loans.name: Azamat

texts.ru:
Азамат молодой предприимчивый человек в возрасте 23-х лет. Он женат, но еще не имеет детей. Азамат с женой и с родителями проживает в селе района Шахритус. Азамат решил заняться животноводческим бизнесом, а именно разведением мясных коров. Это весьма прибыльный бизнес. Так как расходы на содержание скота невелики, а спрос на мясо и мясные продукты стабильно высокий. 
Азамат имеет свой бизнес-план по разведению скота. Он планирует закупать каждый месяц по 5 голов крупнорогатого скота, откармливать их в течение одного месяца и затем выводить на продажу на местный скотный рынок. Азамат работает в микро депозитной организации и накопил сбережение в размере 2100 сомони. Однако для реализации цели эта сумма недостаточна и поэтому он обратился в ХУМО за кредитом. Он на сумму сбережения и кредита хочет приобрести 5 голов коров и телят и их корм. Азамат обещает выплачивать кредит в срок. Ему в ведении нового бизнеса будут помогать родители, у которых большой опыт в этой области. Данный кредит поможет Азамату начать собственный семейный бизнес и уровень их жизни намного улучшится.
texts.en:
Azamat is an enterprising, young man of 23 years. He is married, but does not yet have children. Azamat resides with his wife and parents in the village district of Shahrituz. Azamat decided to start a cattle breeding business, namely in raising beef cattle. This is a very profitable business, as the costs for caring for cattle are small and the demand for meat and meat products is consistently high.

Azamat has a business plan for cattle breeding. He plans to buy five heads of cattle each month, to fatten them for one month and then to put them out for sale at the local cattle market. Azamat works in a micro-deposit organization and has an accumulated savings of 2,100 somoni. However, in order to realize his objective, this sum is not sufficient and so he turned to HUMO for a loan. With the accumulated savings and loan, he wants to get five heads of cattle and their feed. 

Azamat promises to repay the loan on time. His parents, who have a lot of experience in this area, will help run the business. This loan will help Azamat to start his own family business and to significantly improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy five heads of cattle and feed in order to start a livestock business

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a married man with four children, all of whom still attend school and are under his care. They live at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

He operates a business of rearing dairy cows and selling their products; he also does crop farming, where he sells products at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. He cites his major challenge to be the high rate of his livestock getting sick, which is affected by seasons. 

With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase seeds for farming and also buy medicine for his dairy cows. 

He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for farming and  medicine for his dairy cows

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa, a 48-year-old businesswoman from Liberia, is unmarried and has five children between 30 and 12 years of age, three of whom are currently attending school and live at home. She did not go to school but describes herself as a smart businesswoman.

Hawa lives and works in Paynesville North, which has the largest market in Montserrado County. The area is home to “round time marketers,” the local term for traders who travel to the interior regions of the country to purchase goods to sell throughout the county. Because of this, a large number of wholesalers operate in the area who distribute to the markets in the county, including the capital city of Monrovia.

For the past ten years Hawa has had a table business selling oil and pepper. She works nine hours per day. Her greatest challenge is limited capital. She intends to use this loan to buy more oil and pepper for her business. She likes her business because she makes a good profit, and she hopes to one day own a house.

Hawa wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy oil and pepper for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy used sweaters for her powerloom business

loans.name: Takhmina

texts.ru: Тахмина жительница города Конибодом. Ей 29 лет. Она разведена и живет с двумя доченьками у родителей. Тахмина имеет среднее специальное образование. Она по профессии швея. Тахмина более 9 лет занимается шитьем женских национальных платьев и халатов. Она принимает заказы у себя дома. Так как она шьет красиво, качественно и быстро у нее достаточно много клиентов. Одновременно Тахмина обучает желающих кройке и шитью в учебном центре. В данный момент Тахмина хочет расширить свою деятельность. Она просит кредит для покупки компьютерной швейной машинки и тканей для шитья, а также частично для ремонта дома. Тахмина умеет делать вышивку на платье и теперь хочет использовать это свое умение на деле. Так как платье с вышивкой стоит дороже обычного платья, Тахмина будет получать больше дохода от деятельности, что позволит ей улучшить бытовые условия и продвигать деятельность дальше. Балгодаря данному кредиту Тахмина расширит деятельность и отремонтирует дом.
texts.en:
Takhmina is an inhabitant of the town of Konibodom. She is 29 years old. She is divorced and lives with her two daughers at her parents' home. Takhmina has a specialized secondary education. By profession, she is a seamstress. For more than nine years, Takhmina has been sewing women's national dresses and gowns. She takes orders from her home. Since she sews beautifully, efficiently and quickly, she has many customers. 

At the same time,  Takhmina teaches those who wish to know how to cut and sew at the training center. Currently, Takhmina wants to expand her activities. She is requesting a loan to purchase a computerized sewing machine and fabric, and also partly for home renovations. 

Takhmina knows how to do embroidery on dresses and now wants to put her skills into practice. Since dresses with embroidery are more expensive, Takhmina will generate more income from her activities that will allow her to improve living conditions and to promote her activities further. Thanks to the loan, Takhmina will expand her activities and repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase a computerized sewing machine and fabric to expand her activities and partly for home renovations

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is married with two school-age children. They live in their own house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

She operates a business selling khangas (women's wrap garment) from home and door to door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of capital to expand her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase two bales of khangas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of khangas (women's wrap garment) for resale.

loans.name: Shohida

texts.ru: Шохида 36-летняя замужняя женщина, проживающая в городе Конибодом. У нее есть муж, двое дочерей и один маленький сын. Муж Шохиды работает поваром, а оба дочерей учатся в средней школе. Сама Шохида швея. Она занимается шитьем национальных одеял (курпа и курпача). Она в этой области уже 5 лет и научилась этому делу у своей сестры, которая до сих пор помогает ей в деятельности. Шохида очень серьезно относится к своей работе и всегда выполняет свой заказ в срок. Шохида занимается шитьем у себя дома. Сейчас она хотела бы расширить деятельность. С этой целью она обратилась за кредитом. Шохида просит кредит для покупки тканей для продвижения деятельности. Полученную прибыль с деятельности она планирует использовать на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Shohida is a 36-year-old, married woman, residing in the town of Konibodom. She has a husband, two daughters and one small son. Shohida's husband works as a cook, and her two daughters are in high school. Shohida herself is a seamstress. She is involved in sewing national quilts ("kurpa" and "kurpacha"). He has five years experience in this area and learned this business from her sister who is still helping her in her activities. 

Shohida is very serious about her work and always fulfills orders on time. Shohida engages in sewing at home. Now she would like to expand the business. With this goal, she requested a loan to buy fabric for promoting activities. 

She plans to use profits from these activities to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for sewing and promotion of her activities

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma operates a food cafe business cooking and selling food from home to local customers. In addition, she sells fruits and vegetables to supplement her income and to meet the needs of her family. She faces a major challenge of stiff competition in her business.

With the KSH 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase sugar, beans, tea leaves ,wheat flour, maize flour and vegetables for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans, tea leaves, wheat flour, maize flour and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is a married mother of three children, all of whom go to school. They live in their own house which has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For years, she has operated a food stall business, selling from her home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation and dreams of establishing a hotel in the future. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking oil and charcoal. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking oil and charcoal.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma operates a retail shop, selling household consumables. She also operates a charcoal selling business, which provides another source of income. Her major challenges are seasonality and the high cost of transportation.

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, beans and charcoal to sell. 

She joined Yehu because of favorable loan policies.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, beans and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo is a 40-year old business woman from Liberia.  She lives and works in Paynesville North, which has the largest market in Montserrado County.  The area is home to 'round time marketers', the local term for traders who travel to the interior regions of the country to purchase goods to sell throughout the county.  Because of this, there are a large number of wholesalers operating in the area that distribute to the markets in the county, including supplying the capital city of Monrovia.

Korpo is unmarried and has four children between the ages of 4 and 19. Three of her children are currently attending school and live at home.  She did not go to school; she describes herself as a smart businesswoman.
 
Korpo has had a table business for the past ten years, selling used clothes.  She started her business with money from her fiancee. She works nine hours at her business, and her greatest challenge in business is limited capital. 

She intends to use the loan to buy used clothes for her business.  She likes her business because she makes more profit.  

Korpo hopes to one day own a house; she wants to thank Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Al-A`amal Group

texts.en:
Al-A`amal is a group consisting of four women who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They are requesting a loan from AMB for 120,000 YER. 

Nabila is 37 years old, married, and has two children. She is a housewife who likes her children to feel happy. Her children like to have a nice time on the weekend, so she intends to buy a television, but she doesn't have enough money. 

She is requesting a loan for 30,000 YER, which she will use to buy a television to use in her house for her children.

loans.use: to buy a television to use in her house for her children.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 21 years old. He lives in Irbid-Jordan with six siblings. He is currently working at a roaster and is in his second year of study for a degree in medicine. Mohammad is planning to get his Bachelor's degree. He is currently facing personal a financial crisis, and is requesting a loan to pay for his school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his school fees.

loans.name: Zulpiya

texts.ru: Зулпия является скотоводом, проживающим в городе Турсунзаде. Она замужем. Ей 52 года. У нее есть взрослые дети. Последние 5 лет Зулпия занимается животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот мясных и молочных пород. В деятельности ей помогают муж и дети. Зулпия закупает коров и телят со скотного рынка, откармливает их в течение 1-2 месяцев и затем продает с наценкой. Одновременно Зулпия занимается земледелием. Один сын Зулпии находится на заработках в загранице и по мере возможности высылает им деньги. Но основной доход они получают от выращивания скота. Зулпия намерена увеличить поголовье продаваемого скота. Она просит кредит в размере 1050 долларов для закупа скота и его корма. За счет прибыли Зулпия хочет улучшить финансовое положение семьи.
texts.en:
Zulpiya is a cattle farmer, living in the town of Tursun-zoda. She is married. She is 52 years old. She has grown children. For the last five years, Zulpiya has been engaged in raising livestock. She raises meat and dairy breeds. In her activities, she is helped by her husband and children. 

Zulpiya buys cows and calves from the cattle market, fattens them over the course of 1-2 months and then sells them at a premium. At the same time, Zulpiya is engaged in agriculture. 

One of Zulpiya's sons is working abroad and when possible sending money home. But they receive their main source of income from livestock. Zulpiya intends to increase the number of cattle for sale. She is asking for a loan of USD$1,050 to buy livestock and their feed. 

With the profit, Zulpiya wants to improve the financial situation of the family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and their feed

loans.name: Tillo

texts.ru: Тилло 52-летний житель района Вахш. У него большая семья. Он женат и имеет шестерых сыновей. У Тилло высшее экономическое образование. Он в течение 8 лет работает в банке ведущим экономистом. Его жена швея и занимается вышиванием женских платьев. Двое его старших сыновей обзаведены семьями и живут с женами и детьми в доме отца. Они занимаются животноводством. Двое других сыновей учатся в высшем учебном заведении и являются студентами. Один сын работает мигрантом в России. Зайнулло - третий сын Тилло, он нигде не работает. Ему 21 год. Его отец хочет, чтобы он тоже поступил в университет и получил высшее образование. С этим намерением Тилло обратился в ХУМО за кредитом. Он просит кредит в размере 2000 долларов США для оплаты за поступления сына в Государственный Университет города Кургантюбе в факультет истории и права. Тилло надеется, что его сын в будущем станет хорошим специалистом и будет работать в своей сфере, принося пользу государству и обществу.
texts.en: Tillo is 52 years old and lives in Vakhsh, Tajikistan.  He has a large family, he's married and has six sons.  Tillo has a degree in economics.  For eight years he has worked at a bank as its leading economist.  His wife is a seamstress and makes women's dresses.  His two oldest sons have their own families and live with their wives and children in their father's home.  They work with livestock.  Two of his other sons are students at a unviersity.  One son works as a migrant worker in Russia.  Zainullo, Tillo's third son is unemployed.  He is 21 years old and his father wants him to begin studying at a university so he will have a degree.  With this intention, Tillo has turned to HUMO for a loan.  He is asking for 2,000 USD to pay for his son to study history and law at Korgantube State University.  Tillo hopes that his son will become a specialist in the future and will work in his chosen field, benefiting state and society.

loans.use: to pay his son's university tuition

loans.name: Komilzhon

texts.en:
Komilzhon is 40 years old. He and his wife are farmers, and have three children. He is very hardworking and kind-natured. 

Komilzhon has been farming for 15 years, producing maize, wheat and watermelon. He has been in this line of work since his children were little, so all of his experience has been dedicated to producing crops. He sells his products at the local market of his village, and he gets additional income from animal husbandry. He currently has five cows. He wants to develop his business further, so he can increase his profit and improve his living conditions. 

This is the sixth loan from IMON, and he has a good credit history. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 somoni to buy mineral fertilizers and cattle. This loan will help him to develop business and improve his living conditions. 

He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and cattle.

loans.name: Halimah

texts.en:
Halimah operates a charcoal business, selling from home to her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of high transportation costs in her business. She dreams of incorporating firewood into her existing business in the near future.

With the loan she is requesting she plans to purchase 10 sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Lena

texts.en: Lena is a kind and glorious woman. She is 43 years old, divorced and has four children. One of them is an adult, while the rest are children. Lena is the only provider in the family. She has a food shop located near her house where she sells drinks, sweets and other food items. She has great experience in this field as she has been busy with this business for more than 20 years. She has her own clients who are pleased with her goods. Lena would like to increase her working capital and maximize profits. From her profits, she plans to give her children high quality food and a good education. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy food items such as sweets and different kinds of drinks, etc. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy food items to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 26 years old. He lives in Irbid-Jordan. His family consists of seven people. He works as a delivery man at McDonalds. Mohammad is currently studying for a Bachelor's of Business Administration. He is in his fifth year at Yarmouk University. Now he is asking for a loan to continue and expand his studies to get a Masters degree.

loans.use: to expand his studies and get a Masters degree.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
This is Christine from Liberia. She lives in Paynesville North, which is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia. Paynesville North has the largest market in Montserrado County. The area is home to “round time marketers,” traders that travel to the interior to purchase various goods to sell throughout the county. As a result, there is a high concentration of wholesalers in the area that distributes to various markets around Montserrado County, including Monrovia.
Christine is 21, single and has a 2-year-old child. Her child is currently living at home.  
Christine has owned her own table business selling pepper, red oil, vita, onion etc. for the past three years. She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more pepper, red oil, vita, onion etc. to resell.
On average, she works 10 hours a day at her business. She started her business with money given to her by her mother. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi. She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge. Her favorite part of her business is the profit she makes. In the future, she would like to buy a piece of land and build a house.  
She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, red oil, vita, onion etc to resell.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 19 years old, and she lives in Irbid-Jordan. Her family consists of seven members.  Her father is working as a tourist bus driver which is not letting him earn enough money to cover their needs. 

Nancy is currently studying for a degree as a Bachelor of Accounting. She needs money to be able to continue her studies, and she is asking for a loan to cover the fees.

loans.use: To cover her school fees.

loans.name: Muharramkhon

texts.ru: Мухаррамхон молодая самостоятельная девушка в возрасте 27 лет. Она еще не замужем и проживает с родителями в городе Турсунзаде. Мать Мухаррамхон занимается торговым бизнесом. Она на рынке города торгует детскими одеждами. Мухаррамхон помогает матери в бизнесе. Так как ее мать пожилая, она сама едет за покупкой товаров. Одновременно   Мухаррамхон в течение года работает поваром в столовой. Сейчас Мухаррамхон просит кредит для развития их семейного торгового бизнеса. На сумму кредита она хочет приобрести разнообразный ассортимент сезонной детской одежды на продажу с целью увеличения товарооборота. Мухаррамхон очень надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Muharramkhon is a young, independent girl, age 27.  She is not married and lives with her parents in Tursun-zoda, Tajikistan.  Her mother has a business in trade where she sells children's clothing at a city market.  Muharramkhon helps he mother with the business.  Since her mom is older, she herself travels to purchase the goods.  Muharramkhon also works as a cook at a cafeteria.  Now, she is asking for a loan to expand the family business.  She wants to use the loan to buy an assortment of seasonal children's clothing to sell with the goal of increasing turnover.  Muharramkhon hopes for and relies on your support.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of seasonal children's clothing to sell

loans.name: Maamoun

texts.en:
Maamoun is a 62-year-old, married father of three children. 

Twenty years ago, he opened a business where he produces local and organic products for a living. His wife is employed in a library, in the documentation department. One of his children is enrolled in a private college, which means that Maamoun has to settle the tuition fees expenses on top of all the other family expenses. 

Maamoun decided to contact Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development and acquire a loan in order to purchase a water pond that would help him irrigate the fields of his business. It would increase his output and thus increase his revenue. As for the future, Maamoun wishes to dedicate himself to farming.

loans.use: to purchase a water pond that would help him irrigate the fields of his business.

loans.name: Amalya

texts.en:
Amalya has a big family, but now she lives alone in a small city, Gavar, which is in the Gegharkunik region.  Amalya is married, and she has three daughters, all of whom are married and living separately with their families. Her husband is working abroad in the Russian Federation, where he does building and repair work. 

Amalya’s education is vocational, and for two years she has worked at the garment factory. She has been in the trading business for 15 years. 

Amalya rents a stall in Gavar's trading center and sells cosmetics, men's and women's perfumes, self-hygiene supplies and different varieties of hairdryers. With the profit from her business Amalya pays her monthly bills and, from time to time, helps her daughters’ families. 

Amalya asks a loan of 800.000 Armenian drams for the development of her trading business, so she can buy a new assortment of cosmetics and personal hygiene supplies to sell in her stall in Gavar's market. 

Amalya would be greatly touched if she would be supported by Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy a new assortment of cosmetics and personal hygiene supplies to sell.

loans.name: Nuru

texts.en:
Nuru has operated a business selling clothes at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of stiff competition in her business, but she dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

She is requesting a loan of Kes 50,000 to purchase three bales of clothes to sell. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business; she appreciates the support.

loans.use: to purchase three bales of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 22 years old, and lives in Mafraq-Jordan with his parents and four siblings. He is in his second year studying for a Bachelor of Computer Science degree. 

Mohammad is planning to expand his study to get a Masters degree.  As he doesn’t have enough money to pay the needed fees for his study, he is requesting a loan to pay for it.

loans.use: To pay for his study fees.

loans.name: Walid

texts.en: Walid is a 48-year-old married father of three children. He owns a small bakery with 30 years of experience in this domain. He sells a local baked good known as Manakish, a traditional Lebanese breakfast. His wife is currently unemployed and two of his children are enrolled in a private school, which means that he has to settle the tuition fees from his own revenue. He decided to contact Al Majmoua because he needs to maximize his profit in order to provide a healthy life and environment for his family. In fact, he will be using the loan to purchase raw materials, sugar, etc, which are the basic ingredients of his baked goods. As for the future, Walid hopes to open up a new branch of his bakery.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials, sugar, etc. for his bakery

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en: Pamela is a 39-year-old married woman from San Jose, Talibon, Bohol. She has three children. The oldest child is 14 and the youngest is 2 years old. She is engaged in farming. She grows rice. She has been growing rice for almost three years now. Her husband works as a carpenter and his income is not enough to provide the family's daily needs. Pamela requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and to pay fees for the laborers in order to increase her yield as well as to augment her income. In the future, Pamela would like to expand her farming business to support her family and to save for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay fees for the laborers

loans.name: José Candelario

texts.es:
Candelario tiene 74 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos. Él ha sido un hombre muy trabajador, que lucha día a día por un futuro mejor para su familia. Desde hace unos diez años se dedica al cien por ciento a la agricultura auque; él sabe el oficio desde que tenia cinco años de edad, lo cual se lo enseño su abuelo. Antes se dedicaba a trabajar en una fabrica de elaboración de sacos del cultivo de eneken, el vive con su esposa y sus hijos.

Él tiene que viajar unos 10 kilómetros  desde su casa para poder comprar lo necesario para su cultivo  lo cual es  muy pesado;  ya  que por su edad se resulta muy difícil; por lo que debe pagar  para que se lo carguen y se lo descarguen ya que no puede hacer mucha fuerza.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 12 sacos de fertilizantes que los utilizara en su cultivo de maíz, tiene disponibles 21,000 metros cuadrados para cultivar. 

De esta manera, podrá darle todo los cuidados que requiere el cultivo y tendrá su fertilizante a tiempo cuando lo necesite y no estar en apuros y que su cultivo se pase de tiempo y la pierda por completo.

Su  esposa le gusta mucho moler en casa; por lo que con esta producción podrán tener maíz para todo el año, también si todo le sale como espera poder generar ganancias para su familia.

Él tiene dos hijos por los cuales desea seguir trabajando fuerte para darles un estudio universitario y que no se queden sin estudiar como él ya que no le dieron la oportunidad por el nivel de pobreza de sus padres.
texts.en:
Candelario is 74 years old. He is in a relationship and has two children. He is a very hard-working man who struggles day to day for a better future for his family. For ten years, he has dedicated himself 100 percent to agriculture. Since he was five years old, he has known the trade, which his grandfather taught to him. Previously he worked in a factory that produced sacks for agave crops. He lives with his wife and his children.

He has to travel about 10 kilometers from his home to be able to buy necessities for his crop, which is very tiring since for his age it is very difficult for him. Because of this, he has to pay to be taken since he cannot use so much of his strength.

The loan that he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy 12 sacks of fertilizer that he will use on his corn crop; he has 21,000 square meters of land available to cultivate. In this way, he will be able to give all of the care that the crops require and he will have his fertilizer on time when he needs it, to not be hurried, and perhaps have his crop go bad and lose it completely.

His wife enjoys milling at home, and with this crop he will be able to have more corn for the whole year. Also, if everything comes out as expected, he will be able to generate profits for his family. He has two children for whom he wishes to continue working hard to give them a university education so that they are not left without an education like him, since his parents were not able to give him the opportunity due to their poverty.

loans.use: to buy 12 sacks of fertilizers which he will use on his corn crop; he has 21,000 meters squared of land available to cultivate.

loans.name: Juana Aminta

texts.es: Juana de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica al cultivo de pilones de café desde hace varios años con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, doña Juana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plaga, etc. y poder seguir con sus cultivos para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a us familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Juana, 57 years old, lives in her own home with her family. She has made a living cultivating coffee plants for many years. With the profits that she makes she manages to pay her home expenses.

Juana is requesting a loan to be able to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc., and be able to continue with her crops to receive better profits and therefore give better economic stability to her family.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Samuel De Jesus

texts.es: Samuel de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, de esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de cómo ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, las cuales son muy humildes no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Es un hombre luchador, siempre está al pendiente de su familia ya que para él es su principal fuente de inspiración y desea poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito ya que la temporada en la que se realiza la siembra, que es invierno, se aproxima, y quiere estar preparado con los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, herbicidas, fertilizantes etc. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Samuel is 37 and lives in his own house with his family. He cultivates corn and sorghum, which is how he makes his living and is able to provide for his family every day. Farming is what he does year after year, and it is the only way he knows how to make a living. He is a very hard-working, honest, and responsible man. Despite his living conditions, which are very humble, he never tires of working to give his family a better life. He is a determined man, always taking care of his family, because they are his source of inspiration and and he wants to be able to improve their living conditions. 

He made the decision to become affiliated with this institution in order to seek this loan because the season for planting seeds (winter) is nearing. He wants to be prepared with the necessary agricultural supplies, such as manure, pesticides, seeds, herbicides, fertilizers, etc. He hopes to have good results because he doesn't have another source of income. He trusts in God that he will be able to have an abundant harvest, which will allow him to keep providing for his family every day.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides, seeds, herbicides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Hovhannes

texts.en: Hovhannes is 28 years old and lives in the city of Gavar, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Hovhannes is not married and he lives with his parents. He has graduated from Gavar State University's Department of Environmental Protection, but he preferred his specialty of farming. Today he is fully engaged in farming and agriculture and he manages all the work perfectly, sometimes with the help of his mother and very often alone. Hovhaness’ father works and he would be very happy to help his son, but he has no time for it and he is just proud that his son, despite his young age, is a skilled and very famous farmer in their district. Hovhannes has three cows, three calves and ten chickens and he owns a plot of land on which he cultivates tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers and a great verity of greens. His mother sells the farm's dairy products to their neighbors, loyal customers and re-sellers. Hovhannes needs a loan to buy two cows and a lot of animal fodder to keep his farm cattle safe and fed during the winter months.

loans.use: To buy two cows and animal fodder

loans.name: Sereen

texts.en: Sereen is 23 years old. She lives in Ain Al-Basha, Jordan. Her family consists of five members. She is studying in her first year for a Bachelor of Management Information Systems degree. As Sereen is facing a financial crisis during this period, she doesn’t have enough money to be able to continue her studies. She is asking for a loan to pay for the fees for the semester.

loans.use: To pay for her semester fees

loans.name: Gulmirzo

texts.en: Gulmirzo is 40 years old. He is married and has four children. Gulmirzo is a person who always tries to earn money and provide a better life for his children. His wife is a business lady. His children have no source of income. He began his own business dealing in animal husbandry six years ago. He fattens cows. He manages the business alone. Gulmirzo wants to increase the number of his cattle.  He requested a loan of 2,000 USD to increase the number of animals he has for sale. From the profits, he plans to provide his children with high quality food and a good education. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy more animals to fatten and sell

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 27 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad , con quie vive en su casa propia. Jorge, trabaja en la compra y venta de madera, de manera constante se dirige hacia diversos pueblos ribereños en busca de la madera necesaria para cumplir son su trabajo, todo lo que obtiene lo vende en aserraderos de la ciudad o a personas particulares que requieren de este producto. Cuando no tiene oportunidad de viajar hacia la ribera de los ríos, trabaja en la ciudad comprando directamente en los aserraderos ubicados en los alrededores de la urbe. Trabaja con ayuda de su suegra quien le brinda el servicio de transporte fluvial. Lleva en este negocio 8 años y le está yendo muy bien. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1200, por tanto agradece el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará madera al por mayor para su actividad laboral.
texts.en:
Jorge, 27 years old, is married and has a 2-year-old son, with whom he lives in his own home. Jorge works in the purchase and sale of wood. He constantly travels to a variety of riverside villages in search of the wood necessary to complete his work. Everything he obtains he sells to sawmills in the city or to individuals that require this product. When he does not have the opportunity to travel to the riverbanks, he works in the city buying directly from the sawmills located in the outskirts of the city. He works with the help of his mother-in-law who provides river transport to him. He has worked in this business for eight years and it is going very well for him.

In this opportunity, he will request 1200 Nuevos Soles. Therefore, he is thankful for the financial support that he is receiving to continue forward. Furthermore, he promises to make his payments punctually. With the amount requested, he will buy wood wholesale for his business.

loans.use: to buy wood wholesale.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y su esposo tiene 40 años de edad, disfrutan de una hija, la cual tiene 5 años de edad y actualmente estudia. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, esta actividad la realiza desde hace tres años y lo desempeña todos los días.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar maíz y leña para llevar a cabo la elaboración de tortillas; esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener mayores ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer más en el negocio y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca is 38 years old and married. Her husband is 40 years old. They have a five-year-old daughter who is currently in school. Francisca sells tortillas. She started her business three years ago and works at it every day.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy the corn and firewood that she uses in making tortillas. This investment will help to increase her inventory so that she can generate more income. Her dreams are to strengthen her business even more and to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Amani

texts.en:
Amani was born in 1981. She is married and has three children. Her husband is working as a taxi driver. Amani has been working at selling clothes for six years. She borrowed a loan in the past to be able to buy clothes and sell them. Now she is facing a problem with buying clothes from Amman and transporting them to Aqaba because of the far distance between them. 

Amani is planning to expand her project by increasing the amount of purchases and the number of customers during the summer. She is requesting a loan to be able to buy clothes from Aqaba to sell.

loans.use: To buy clothes for her clothing sales business

loans.name: Louay

texts.en:
Louay is a 31-year-old married father of one child. He has owned a small business where he paints and maintains furniture for sixteen years. His wife is currently unemployed, which means that he is the only financial provider of the family. However, his revenue is barely enough to provide for his family and one of his parents.

 He contacted Al Majmoua because he needs to undergo surgery which he cannot afford with his present income. The surgery is crucial for him to be in good shape since he has to provide for four individuals. As for the future, Louay wishes to expand his business and increase his revenue.

loans.use: to undergo surgery which he cannot afford with his present income

loans.name: Evalyn

texts.en:
Evalyn used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell. She is a thirty-three-year-old single mother of two children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling second-hand clothes for nine years and works for ten hours a day. Like most good mothers she has a dream of educating her children up to the University, building a permanent house and owning a modern boutique. She has challenges of price fluctuation and high cost of transport to the different markets. 

Evalyn is requesting a loan to buy used clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Kanabi

texts.en:
Kanabi is a forty-six-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in the transport business for seventeen years and works twelve hours a day. His business is located on a busy street and he also runs a retail shop to earn extra income. He hopes to educate his children up to the University and own at least three taxis despite lack of enough capital.

 Kanabi intends to use the money to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Al-Zhor Group

texts.en: This group is called Alzhor and is composed of four women. Nafisa, age 42, is the president of the group. She is a married woman, has four children and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She would like to remodel her house. On this occasion, she needs a loan of YER 60,000 from AMB to buy building materials such as cement and lumber. She is grateful for the loan and commits to making her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy building materials, such as cement and lumber.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Sonishka

texts.en:
Sonishka is a nice skilled businesswoman who lives in the small city of Kadjaran, located in the Syunik region. A married mother of three daughters who are already married and living separately with their families, Sonishka and her husband are retired but not enjoying their old age; they continue to work hard and without holidays, since the stipend that they are given is too small to meet their everyday needs and pamper their grandchildren.

Sonishka has a small rented stall where she sells vegetables, fruits, berries, dairy products, and some seedlings for farmers for their cultivation activities. Located in the center of Kadjaran and assisted by her husband, her enterprise attracts many customers each day.

Three times in a week they buy products for their stall from farmers and villagers who live nearby. Sonishka is requesting a loan in order to buy large quantities of vegetables and fruits for resale.

loans.use: To buy vegetables and fruits to resell

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha was born in 1979. She is married and has three daughters. Her husband is working as a driver. Rasha has been working at selling clothes and blankets for three years as it became her own source of income. The amount of purchases Rasha got during winter was better than those she got during summer. She is planning to buy more clothes and increase her merchandise to be able to continue her project. 

Rasha made an agreement with some customers regarding some clothes and is requesting a loan to be able to buy them.

loans.use: To increase her merchandise (clothes and blankets)

loans.name: Sunatullo

texts.ru: Сунатулло умный и энергичный молодой человек. Ему 18 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями и братьями и сестрами. В этом году он успешно окончил среднюю школу и получил аттестат с оценками хорошо и отлично. В школе он был одним из лучших учеников. Он любил такие предметы как математика, история, география, английский язык и т.п. Сунатулло поступил на первый курс и мечтает стать хорошим специалистом. Он всегда мечтал стать личностью с высшим образованием и верно служить своей Родине. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но его родители не имеют денег для оплаты его учебного договора. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 800 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sunatullo is a smart and energetic young man. He is 18, single, and lives with his parents and his brothers and sisters. He graduated from high school this year and received his diploma with excellent grades. He was one of the best students in school. He loved subjects such as mathematics, history, geography, and English. Sunatullo is beginning his first year of university and wants to become an expert professional. He always dreamed of getting a college degree to faithfully serve his homeland. He has to pay for his tuition but his parents do not have the money. He has asked for a loan of $800 to cover the tuition expense. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is a 58-year-old married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She has six children. The youngest is 14 while the oldest is 31. She is engaged in fishing. She sells fish to earn a living. Her husband is a fisherman. She has been in fishing for more than 10 years now. 

To be able to continue her fishing livelihood, Virgilia requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fishing net to improve her catch and to gain more income.In the future, Virgilia would like to invest in other business ventures to be able to save in order to build a retail store as well as  to provide her children with quality education.

loans.use: to buy fishing net

loans.name: Kurera

texts.en: Kurera is very optimistic with life. He has operated a barber shop for the past four years. Here again he comes to you for another loan of Kes 20,000 to purchase another shaving machine for use in his business. He appreciates the support.

loans.use: to purchase another shaving machine for use in his business.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en: Nawal was born in 1964. She is divorced and lives in Irbid-Amman. Nawal has been selling household wares for two years. She started her project with borrowing a loan to sell juice glasses and found it a profitable idea which encouraged her to buy more house wares. She is planning to expand her project by also selling clothes if possible and is requesting a loan to buy new merchandise.

loans.use: To buy new household products to re-sell them

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania, who was born in 1980, lives in Madaba, Jordan where she is a married mother of three daughters and one son. Her husband works as a carpenter.

Rania has been selling clothes and blankets for one year, having started her enterprise with 200 JD. She is seeking a loan to buy new products such as clothes, blankets and accessories to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy new products to sell such as clothes, blankets and accessories

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en: Khaled is a 34-year-old married man. He is employed as salesperson, while his wife is currently unemployed. His revenue is barely enough to provide for a family of two members. His wife is pregnant, which is why he decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan. In fact, the loan would help him pay for his wife’s hospital expenses, and to prepare for the birth of his first child, and would be beneficial in providing a healthy environment for his newborn. As for the future, Khaled wishes to obtain enough financial resources in order to launch his own personal business.

loans.use: to  pay for his wife’s hospital expenses, and to prepare for the birth of his first child

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es: Verónica  de 32 años de edad posee una pequeña tienda donde vende refrescos, gaseosas, leche, azúcar, granos básicos, café, sopas, etc. desde hace 10 años tiene mucha clientela porque tiene surtida la pequeña tienda con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, verónica esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más productos refrescos, gaseosas, leche, azúcar, granos básicos, café, sopas, etc.  por mayor para obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Verónica, age 32, has a small store where she has been selling carbonated drinks, soft drinks, milk, sugar, basic grains, coffee, and soup, etc. for ten years.  She has a lot of clientele because she has her store stocked.  With the earnings that she gets from her sales, she manages to pay the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her husband and their children.

Verónica is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy more products like carbonated drinks, soft drinks, milk, basic grains, coffee, and soup, etc.  She will buy them wholesale in order to get better earnings to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more products like carbonated drinks, soft drinks, milk, basic grains, coffee, and soup, etc.

loans.name: Bakari

texts.en:
Bakari is single and has two children who attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food, rent, and school fees.

She has been operating a beauty salon. Her potential customers are neighbours and town-dwellers. She dreams of adding a beauty training school to her business. 

With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos. She joined Yehu because of favorable loan requirements.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Although he has received no prior formal education, Emmanuel is an entrepreneur. He specializes in selling poultry in Apewosika (near Cape Coast). He has been involved in this enterprise for 15 years. Emmanuel is married and has five children. His wife works as a trader. The proceeds from his business normally go towards helping his wife cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees.

 Emmanuel wants to use his loan to increase his current flock, hence allowing him to sell greater quantities of poultry. In the long term, Emmanuel plans to reinvest future profits into his business, thus helping him expand and meet the needs of rising customer demand.

loans.use: to expand his current flock of poultry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cassava to improve her overall sales

loans.name: Maria Prinsela

texts.es: María de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, ella tiene un negocio de salón de belleza desde hace 20 años en su lugar de residencia eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para tener su negocio estable y constante, trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. María  solicita un crédito para poder comprar productos para su salón de belleza como: cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, tintes para el cabello, máquina para cortar barba, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: María, age 56, lives in her own home with her daughter. She has had a beauty salon for 20 years in her home. This has given her the necessary experience to have a stable, constant business. She works from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm and has a large clientele because she works very well. With her income she is able to cover her household costs. Maria is requesting a loan for the purchase of products for her beauty salon such as: creams, shampoo, hairpins, scissors, hair dye, a machine for cutting beards, and other items that she needs. This will allow her to obtain a better income that will help her to have greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy cream, shampoo, hairpins, scissors, hair dye, and a machine to cut beards.

loans.name: Virginia Alejandra

texts.es: Doña Virginia habita en el barrio René Polanco, una zona marginal de Managua, procreo 6 hijos siendo madre soltera, lucho para sacarlos adelante hoy en día son mayores e independientes,  ahora Virginia trabaja para mantener su hogar vendiendo ropa, cosméticos. Solicita el crédito para mejorar su hogar, en esta ocasión tiene la necesidad de construir un cuarto en la parte trasera de su casa, de esta manera irá dando un poco de orden y forma a su humilde vivienda.
texts.en: Doña Virginia lives in the Rene Polanco neighbourhood, an area on the periphery of Managua. She has six children and is a single mother. She worked hard to get them ahead and they are now all grown and independent. Virginia now works to maintain her home. She sells clothing and cosmetics and is requesting this loan for home improvements. She now needs to build a room on the back of her home. This will provide a bit of order and shape to her humble home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like cement, iron, sand, planks of wood, and blocks.

loans.name: Enid Kasandra

texts.es:
Enid, de 28 años de edad es una joven que vive en Managua, es madre de  un hijo de 3 años de edad. Ella estudio medicina general , escogió esta carrera porque desde muy joven le ha gustado y soñado ser médico  además que le permite estar en contacto directo con las personas y solucionar parte de su necesidades médicas, además de ser una labor que se puede desempeñar por cuenta propia.  Una de sus metas es logra tener su propia clínica y estudiar una especialidad en pediatría. 
Hoy está solicitando el crédito para pagar su título de graduación y poder graduarse.
texts.en:
Enid, age 28, is a young woman who lives in Managua. She is the mother of a three-year-old child. She studies general medicine. She chose this degree because she liked it at a young age and has dreamed of being a doctor since she was a child. It also allows her to be in direct contact with people and solve some of their medical needs. She also likes that this is work she can do on her own. One of her goals is to have her own clinic and to study and specialize in paediatrics.
She is now requesting a loan to pay her degree costs and to be able to graduate.

loans.use: to pay her degree costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Reyna tiene 39 años, tiene un  hijo que se encuentran en edad escolar,  ella se dedica a tejido de chompas y mantas, tiene su taller y domicilio en la zona de  Satélite de la ciudad de El Alto, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la  Sra. Reyna va a usar este préstamo para la compra de lana de alpaca por mayor para el tejido de sus chompas y mantas ya que por esta fechas tiene mucha venta ya que hace mucho frio, también entrega pedidos a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de El Alto, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital de trabajo, la  Sra. Reyna enfrenta retos en su negocio que son surtir su mercadería y va a utilizar los beneficios e seguir comprando por mayor sus materiales para el tejido de sus chompas, su deseo es tener una tienda más amplia para poder ofrecer y mostrar sus productos.
texts.en: Reyna is 39. She has one school-aged child. She knits sweaters and blankets in her workshop, located in her home in the Satélite zone of the city of El Alto. This is her first loan with the institution. Reyna will use it to purchase alpaca wool wholesale for knitting sweaters and blankets, because she sells a lot of these during this season because it is very cold. She also delivers orders to the various markets in the city of El Alto. She is requesting this loan to increase her working capital. Reyna confronts challenges in her business including stocking merchandise. She will use her profits to continue buying materials wholesale for weaving her sweaters. She wants to have a larger store in order to demonstrate and sell her products.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool.

loans.name: Vitaliy

texts.ru:
Виталий работает водителем на фирме Лига-Транс. Он женат, имеет одну взрослую дочь. Вместе с ними в доме живут еще его мама и бабушка. Так что Виталия вполне можно назвать главой семьи.

Виталий просит предоставить ему кредит на ремон дома. Он хочет заменить старые двери, накленить во всех комнатах новые обои. Виталий надеется, что сделанный ремонт не только улучшит жилищные условия, но и настроение в его большом доме.
texts.en: Vitaliy works as a driver for the company Liga-Trans. He is married and has one adult daughter. His mother and grandmother also live together with him.  So, Vitaliy can be considered the head of the family.  Vitaliy has requested to receive a loan to repair his home.  He wants to change the old doors and put up new wallpaper in all the rooms.  Vitaliy hopes that remodeling will improve not only his living conditions, but also the mood of his large household.

loans.use: to improve living conditions by changing doors and putting up new wallpaper

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a 30-year-old married woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. For four years, she been selling clothes and water to earn income for the family. A good mother, she desires to educate her children up to the university level and to set up sustainable income generating projects for them. She hopes to expand her business to new areas, however, lack of enough capital is her challenge. Agnes is requesting for a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: El Eden Group

texts.es:
Un grupo conformado por 10  personas emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “EL EDEN”.  La Sra. María de 61 años de edad casada  y sin hijos, la Sra. María tiene  una pequeña bodega  ya hace unos  25 años. La Sra. María,ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   
el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus productos y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos para su bodega  y así seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. María  y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado    y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. María es la  primera de la mano derecha con pantalón negro, se despide Dejando la promesa que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
The “El Edén” (Eden) communal bank consists of a group of ten enterprising people who are very creative in business.  María, 61, is married and has no children.  She has had a small store for about 25 years and she’s succeeded in acquiring a regular clientele that has generated profits to cover household expenses.

In future, she’d like to have a space of her own in which to sell her products and to earn higher profits.  She will use the granted loan to buy more products for her store to continue meeting customer demand and thus get ahead.

María and all the group members are grateful to Kiva for the loan granted and for the trust that’s been placed.  María is first on the right wearing black pants.  She takes her leave promising to meet all her stated goals.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances, Abena did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Abena prepares and sells Kenkey (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough and wrapped in banana leaves) in her village of Apewosika (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about six years. She is married to a farmer, and together they have six children. 

Abena uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. Abena will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of maize, which will aid her in improving her overall Kenkey sales. She wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of maize, which will aid her in improving her overall "Kenkey" sales.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco es un hombre de 40 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Marco no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Medicina Humana que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus hijos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Marco trabaja en su pequeño negocio de lavado de autos, el ocupa un pequeño espacio donde realiza labores de lavado y limpieza de autos, Marco trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Marco se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea comprar materiales de construcción para poder arreglar el techado y ponerle piso de concreto a su hogar, de esta manera Marco brindará mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio local de lavado de autos.
texts.en:
Marco is a 40-year-old man. He lives in the city of Ica with his wife and children, whom he loves; they are his main reason for living. He is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic man. He and his wife give their all to get their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and because he had to start working at a very young age in order to help his parents, Marco was not able to study medicine as he had wanted. In his free time, he enjoys playing with his children.
With great hard work and dedication, Marco runs a small carwash business. He started this business on his own initiative. He has a small space where he washes and cleans cars, and he works every day for approximately 12 hours a day. He thinks that it is going well for him because of his good prices and friendly customer service.
Marco is very grateful to the Kiva lenders; thanks to their help he will be able to make repairs to his home. He wants to buy construction materials in order to repair the roof and install a concrete floor. In doing so, Marco will provide his family with better security and well-being. He will keep working hard to achieve his great dream of having his own storefront for his carwash business.

loans.use: to make repairs to his home.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario, vive en la ciudad de Managua, casada madre de 2 hijos casada. Ella trabaja en la venta de impresiones y publicidad y a la vez estudia la carrera de derecho los días sábado. A pesar de la situación económica que se esa viviendo cada día, no es motivo para darse por vencida y no alcanzar una de sus más anheladas metas como es lograr graduarse de la carrera de derecho pues esto le permite trabajar por su propia cuenta y en varias áreas de las leyes esta una de las razones por las cuales decidió estudiar derecho. También para conseguir otros formas de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia además de sentirse orgullosa porque a pesar de su edad sigue adelante. Ella está requiriendo el crédito para pagar su título universitario. Uno de sus planes futuros es logra establecer una firma de abogados para brindar asesoría legal y notariado.
texts.en: Rosario lives in the city of Managua; she’s married and mother of two children.  She works selling printing and publicity while at the same time attends law school Saturdays.
